item.title: Why a diversified approach to income is ‘essential’ right now, according to UBS
item.description: The investment bank lays out what investors should consider in the way of income this year.

item.title: Friday's big stock stories: What’s likely to move the market in the next trading session
item.description: Post-earnings gains for Morgan Stanley and Goldman Sachs, as well as a rally in chips, helped lift the major averages to a positive session Thursday.

item.title: AI trade back on? The company behind chip leaders like Nvidia and AMD just raised its spending forecast
item.description: Robust earnings results from chip manufacturing giant TSMC just gave a huge lift to the AI trade.

item.title: 3M heads into earnings exemplifying market shift to value, with plenty of room to rally
item.description: The maker of Post-it Notes and protective healthcare gear and masks has been on a slow and steady rise going back to its 2023 lows.

item.title: Retail investors have a new favorite trade
item.description: Individual investors are piling into the silver trade.
